author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

In preparation for Run-3 MC productions this PR moves the GEM trigger primitive producers from the DIGI to the L1 step. It is necessary to ensure that all steps (DIGI, L1T, DIGI2RAW, and RAW2DIGI) are run correctly, for all the eras (Run2, Run3, Phase-2). The changes are minimal, so that the names of all producers and analyzers involved remain the same. The GEM TP producers are now put in new package `L1Trigger/L1TGEM`.

#### PR validation:

I checked that it runs with WF 11634.0 in CMSSW_11_0_X_2019-10-22-1100.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

N/A

@tahuang1991
title: Move GEM trigger primitive producers from DIGI to L1 step
